name: TokTik ColorPick
description:
TokTik ColorPick

Guess the Paint

Directly inspired by the #guessthepaint TikToks of  Christian M Hull which came to my attention through the tweet of Rebecca Jennings. TokTik ColorPick allows you to get in on the fun of guessing the paint color.

Font:

Poppins by Indian Type Foundry

Music:

Monkeys Spinning Monkeys Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Speaker Off Icon by Delapouite under CC BY 3.0 

Coverage and Mentions:
